mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Enrollments e JOIN Classes c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} AND c.course_id = #{courseId} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Enrollments WHERE class_id = #{classId}

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.password_hash, u.full_name, u.email, UPPER(u.role) as role, u.created_at FROM Users u JOIN Enrollments e ON u.user_id = e.student_id WHERE e.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY u.full_name
